snippet: SCHREIBER--Sol. With deep sorrow, Ovarian Cancer Research Fund Alliance mourns the passing of our beloved founder and Chairman Emeritus, Sol Schreiber. We are grateful for his foresight, leadership and steady guidance for the last 22 years. Sol's legacy continues to help women all over the world and will one day result in a cure for ovarian cancer. We will miss him greatly, and extend our heartfelt sympathies to his family and friends. The Board & Staff of Ovarian Cancer Research Fund Alliance. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHREIBER--Sol. With deep sorrow, Ovarian Cancer Research Fund Alliance mourns the passing of our beloved founder and Chairman Emeritus, Sol Schreiber. We are grateful for his foresight, leadership and steady guidance for the last 22 years. Sol's legacy continues to help women all over the world and will one day result in a cure for ovarian cancer. We will miss him greatly, and extend our heartfelt sympathies to his family and friends. The Board & Staff of Ovarian Cancer Research Fund Alliance. 1/3
